title: 1.7.10魔法作物问题
author: 云树
txt_content:
我的魔法作物是Magical Crops_1.7.10-0.1
打怪不掉精华能不能呢改配置让它掉落？
# Configuration file

"essence ore options" {
    I:"Edit max amount of Essence ore that can generate per vein, default = 4"=4
    I:"Edit the number to change the Y Cord that essence ore starts generating in the overworld, default = 45"=45
    B:"Essence ore spawns in the nether"=true
    B:"Essence ore spawns in the overworld"=true
}


general {
    I:"Amount of experience that experience drops give, default 40"=40
    B:"Chance of weak essence dropping from magical crops"=true
    I:"Disable or enable the potion addon, 1 = Enable(Default), 0 = Disable"=1
    B:"Easy Magic fertilizer recipe (bonemeal & nature essence)"=false
    I:"Edit the amount of seeds you get when crafting, Default 1, Max 64"=1
    B:"Essence armor gives creative flight (if set to false tier 4/Mark 4 armor is uncraftable)"=true
    B:"Magical crops display particle effects"=true
    B:"You can craft Magic fertilizer"=true
}


"output_1 vanilla essence crafting" {
    I:"Blaze Rod, default 3, Max 64, Min 1"=3

}

}

    I:"Ender Pearls, default 4, Max 64, Min 1"=4
}


"output_4 mod essence crafting" {
    I:"Aluminum Ore, default 6, Max 64, Min 1"=6

replies.author: CheatDiamond
replies.txt_content: 你要改什么呢？你用谷歌翻译一下不就行了吗？

replies.author: 云树
replies.txt_content:
李j 发表于 2019-10-10 08:28
你要改什么呢？你用谷歌翻译一下不就行了吗？
打怪掉落精华

replies.author: CheatDiamond
replies.txt_content:
云树 发表于 2019-10-10 08:51
打怪掉落精华
我记得本来就有掉精华的
怪物掉精华在配置里面不让修改，我搜索“mob”都没东西

replies.author: CheatDiamond
replies.txt_content:
云树 发表于 2019-10-10 09:38
我那就是不掉落
重新装一下
https://www.mcmod.cn/class/430.html
在MagicalCropsCore的配置文件里面 有个monster drop options 你把里面全部复制到翻译里就知道了

本帖最后由 2581891560 于 2020-8-5 18:28 编辑 

直接改成true就行
